support_banner.title: Support banner
support_banner.switch_description: Show your support for important causes with a profile banner. Only one banner can be active at a time.
support_banner.link_info: Your banner will link to this

0.caption: Support Creator
0.card_message: Take a look at my projects and the things I've added to GitHub. You'll find a mix of different stuff I've worked on, and I'm excited to share them with you!
0.banner_message: I invite you to explore my GitHub profile, where you can find an array of exciting projects and contributions. Feel free to take a look, and if you find something you like, don't hesitate to show your support by leaving a star ‚≠ê

1.caption: #FreePalestine
1.card_message: Display a support banner to encourage your visitors to #FreePalestine, donate and discover resources, and support the right for people everywhere to live in peace.
1.banner_message: I'm driving awareness, donations, and support to #FreePalestine, and the right for people everywhere to live in peace. Will you join me?

2.caption: #StandWithUkraine
2.card_message: Display a support banner to encourage your visitors to #StandWithUkraine, donate and discover resources, and support the right for people everywhere to live in peace.
2.banner_message: I'm driving awareness, donations and support to #StandWithUkraine, and the right for people everywhere to live in peace. Will you join me?

3.caption: Anti-Racism
3.card_message: Display a support banner on your Linktree allowing your visitors to donate and discover resources in support of anti-racism, justice and equality.
3.banner_message: I'm raising awareness, driving donations and sharing information in support of racial justice and equality. Will you join me?

4.caption: Pride
4.card_message: Display a support banner to raise awareness and funds for the LGBTQIA+ community during Pride month.
4.banner_message: In celebration of Pride, I'm raising awareness and funds to support the LGBTQIA+ community. Join me.

sensitive_material.title: Sensitive material
sensitive_material.description: Display a sensitive content warning before visitors can view your profile.

seo.title: SEO
seo.card_description: Changes to metadata may take some time to appear on other platforms.

appearance.custom_appearance_description: Completely customize your Linktree profile. Change your background with colors, gradients and images. Choose a button style, change the typeface and more.

banners.description: Add a professional banner to the top of your contact card. Choose from colors, gradients, images, or videos.

media.no_items: No media yet. Add your first media item to get started!

media.enable_message: Enable Media Embed to start adding images and videos to your profile.

cache.cached_data: üìä Showing cached data - real-time updates will appear automatically

empty.today: No activity recorded in the last 7 days.

empty.month: No data to display for the last month.

performance.share_prompt: Share your profile to get views and clicks!

analytics.no_traffic_data: No traffic source data available yet.

traffic.share_prompt: Share your profile link to start tracking traffic sources!
traffic.no_activity: Traffic sources found but no activity recorded yet.
traffic.keep_sharing: Keep sharing your profile to generate traffic data!

info.traffic_description: Traffic sources help you understand where your visitors come from. This data shows you which platforms drive the most engagement to your profile.

header.title: Account & Privacy
header.subtitle: Manage your personal data and privacy preferences
header.deletion_warning_message: Your account is scheduled for deletion on {{date}}. You can cancel this at any time before that date.

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.welcome: Welcome to your Account & Privacy Center. Here you can manage all aspects of your personal data, exercise your rights under GDPR, and control how your information is used.

export_card.title: Export Your Data
export_card.description: Download all your personal data in machine-readable formats (JSON, CSV, vCard). Compatible with all contact managers.

consents_card.title: Manage Consents
consents_card.description: Review and update your privacy consents. Control which features can process your data.

settings_card.title: Privacy Settings
settings_card.description: Configure your privacy preferences, including profile visibility and data sharing.

delete_card.title: Delete Account
delete_card.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

gdpr_info.title: About GDPR Compliance
gdpr_info.description: Weavink is fully compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and takes your privacy seriously. All your data is stored in EU data centers, encrypted, and protected according to the highest standards. You have full control over your personal information at all times.

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download all your personal data in machine-readable formats. Your export will include:

rateLimit.title: Rate Limit Reached
rateLimit.message: You've reached the maximum of 3 data exports per hour. This limit helps protect our servers and your data.

success.title: Export Completed!
success.message: Your data has been exported successfully. Download the files below:

delete.title: Delete Your Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

pending.title: Account Deletion Pending
pending.message: Your account is scheduled for permanent deletion on {{date}}.
pending.warning: All your data, including contacts, groups, and settings, will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone after the deletion date.

warning.title: Before you delete:
warning.export: Consider exporting your data first (you won't be able to access it after deletion)
warning.all_data: This will delete all your contacts, groups, and settings
warning.notify: Users who have you as a contact will be notified
warning.grace_period: You have 30 days to cancel the deletion before it's final

consents.title: Manage Consents
consents.description: Control which features can process your data. You can withdraw consent at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

essential.name: Essential
essential.description: Required for the application to function properly

terms_of_service.name: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.description: Acceptance of our terms and conditions

ai_business_card.name: AI Business Card Enhancement
ai_business_card.description: Use AI (Google Gemini 2.0) to extract information from business card images with high accuracy

ai_semantic_search.name: AI Semantic Search
ai_semantic_search.description: Enable AI-powered search with query enhancement, embeddings, reranking, and intelligent result analysis

ai_auto_grouping.name: AI Auto-Grouping
ai_auto_grouping.description: Automatically group contacts using intelligent algorithms, venue enrichment, and event detection

analytics_basic.name: Basic Analytics
analytics_basic.description: Basic usage statistics (page views, feature usage) - anonymized data only

analytics_detailed.name: Detailed Analytics
analytics_detailed.description: Detailed usage patterns and behavior analysis for improving user experience

cookies_analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
cookies_analytics.description: Cookies used to track usage patterns and improve the application

marketing_emails.name: Marketing Emails
marketing_emails.description: Receive newsletters, product updates, and promotional offers

contact_recommendations.name: Contact Recommendations
contact_recommendations.description: Receive suggestions for potential connections based on your network

cookies_personalization.name: Personalization Cookies
cookies_personalization.description: Remember your preferences and customize your experience

profile_public.name: Public Profile
profile_public.description: Make your profile visible to other users on the platform

info.title: About Your Consent Rights
info.withdraw: You can withdraw your consent at any time by toggling the switches above.
info.lawfulness: Withdrawing consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before withdrawal (GDPR Art. 7.3).
info.essential: Essential consents are required for the service to function and cannot be withdrawn without deleting your account.
info.tiers: Some features require specific subscription tiers and may be unavailable if consent is withdrawn.
info.audit: All consent changes are logged and can be audited. Contact our Data Protection Officer if you have questions.

settings.title: Privacy Settings
settings.description: Configure your privacy preferences and control how your data is used.

profile_visibility.title: Profile Visibility
profile_visibility.description: Control who can see your profile and contact information. When your profile is public, anyone can view your information. When private, only approved connections can see your details.
profile_visibility.label: Profile Status:

allow_messages.title: Allow Messages
allow_messages.description: Allow other users to send you messages through the platform. You can disable this to prevent unsolicited messages while still maintaining your connections.
allow_messages.label: Messages:

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Control how you receive notifications about your account activity.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Receive important updates and notifications via email

push.title: Push Notifications
push.description: Receive real-time push notifications on your devices

quick_actions.title: Additional Privacy Controls
quick_actions.consents: Manage detailed consent preferences in the {{link}} tab
quick_actions.export: Export all your data in the {{link}} tab
quick_actions.delete: Request account deletion in the {{link}} tab

gdpr_info.title: Your Privacy Rights
gdpr_info.description: Under GDPR, you have the right to control your personal data. These settings give you granular control over your privacy preferences. All changes are logged and auditable. For more information about how we process your data, please review our {{link}}.

contact_download.title: Contact Download Settings
contact_download.description: Control who can download your contact information and what fields are available

contact_download_settings.title: Contact Download Settings
contact_download_settings.description: Control who can download your contact information and what fields are available

master_toggle.title: Enable Contact Downloads
master_toggle.description: Allow visitors to download your contact information as a vCard file. When disabled, the download button will not appear on your public profile.

fields.title: Available Fields
fields.description: Choose which fields visitors can include when downloading your contact. Required fields cannot be disabled.

info_card.title: How It Works
info_card.description: When visitors click the Download Contact button on your profile, they'll see a modal where they can choose which of your enabled fields to include in the vCard file. Fields you disable here won't be available for visitors to download.

website_config.title: Website Configuration
website_config.description: Configure your website preferences and default settings.

language.title: Default Language
language.description: Set your preferred default language for the website. This will be applied automatically when you log in. You can still change the language temporarily using the language switcher in the navigation bar.

info.title: How Language Settings Work
info.default: Your default language is saved and applied automatically when you log in
info.navbar: You can temporarily change the language using the language switcher in the navigation bar
info.session: Temporary language changes only affect your current session
info.persistent: To make a language change permanent, update your default language here

tutorial_progression.title: Tutorial Progression
tutorial_progression.subtitle: Track your onboarding progress and revisit any step
tutorial_progression.skipped_message: You skipped the tutorial. You can still jump to any step to learn more.

access.title: ‚úì Right to Access
access.description: View and download all your personal data

erasure.title: ‚úì Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Delete your account and all data

restriction.title: ‚úì Right to Restriction
restriction.description: Limit how your data is processed

welcome.title: Welcome to Weavink!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your account in just a few steps

language.title: Choose Your Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the interface. You can change this later in your account settings.
language.label: Language

onboarding.error: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.

welcome.title: Thank you for choosing Weavink!
welcome.description: We truly value our users. This mini tutorial will help you get started and use the app to its full potential.

navbar.title: Navigation Bar
navbar.description: Access all features from here. You can manage your links, customize your appearance, view analytics, manage contacts, and adjust settings.

navbar_links.title: Links Page
navbar_links.description: Manage all your links and content. Add, edit, reorder, and customize your links to share with your audience.

navbar_appearance.title: Appearance Page
navbar_appearance.description: Customize your profile's look and feel. Choose themes, colors, fonts, and backgrounds to match your brand.

navbar_analytics.title: Analytics Page
navbar_analytics.description: Track your profile performance. View profile views, link clicks, traffic sources, and visitor insights.

navbar_contacts.title: Contacts Page
navbar_contacts.description: Manage your network. View and organize contacts who have shared their information through your profile.

navbar_settings.title: Settings Page
navbar_settings.description: Configure your account. Manage social icons, SEO, sensitive content warnings, and support banners.

navbar_share.title: Share Your Profile
navbar_share.description: Share your Weavink profile everywhere. Add to social media, generate QR codes, or copy your link.

navbar_account.title: Account & Privacy
navbar_account.description: Now let's take a short tour of the Account & Privacy page, where you can manage your privacy settings and track your tutorial progress.

account_privacy_overview.title: Privacy Overview
account_privacy_overview.description: This section contains multiple tabs for managing your data: export your data, delete your account, manage consents, and configure privacy settings.

account_privacy_tabs.title: Privacy Tabs
account_privacy_tabs.description: Explore these tabs: Overview shows all options, Export Data lets you download your information, Delete Account for account removal, Consents for permissions, and Settings for privacy preferences.

account_tab_overview.title: Overview Tab
account_tab_overview.description: View a summary of all privacy options available to you in one place.

account_tab_export.title: Export Data Tab
account_tab_export.description: Download all your personal data in machine-readable formats for portability.

account_tab_delete.title: Delete Account Tab
account_tab_delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data - this action cannot be undone.

account_tab_consents.title: Consents Tab
account_tab_consents.description: Review and manage your privacy consents and control which features can process your data.

account_tab_settings.title: Privacy Settings Tab
account_tab_settings.description: Configure your privacy preferences, including profile visibility and data sharing options.

account_tab_contact_download.title: Contact Download Tab
account_tab_contact_download.description: Export your contact information in formats compatible with contact managers.

account_tab_website_config.title: Website Configuration Tab
account_tab_website_config.description: Customize how your profile appears on external websites and embeds.

account_tutorial_progression.title: Tutorial Progression
account_tutorial_progression.description: Track your progress through the tutorial here. You can revisit any section, see which steps you've completed, and pick up where you left off.

create_link.title: Create Your First Link
create_link.description: Click the button below to add your first link to your digital business card.

link_form.title: Add Link Form
link_form.description: Here you can add any link to your profile. Popular options include social media, websites, or contact methods.

features.url: Enter any URL (social media, website, etc.)
features.title: Customize the link title
features.icon: Choose an icon for your link

appearance.title: Customize Your Appearance
appearance.description: Make your digital business card unique! Customize colors, themes, fonts, and layouts to match your brand.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: Congratulations! You now know how to use Weavink. Start creating amazing connections!
completion.next_steps: Start adding links and customizing your profile

completion.error: Failed to save tutorial progress. Please try again.

skip.success: Tutorial skipped. You can always access help from settings.
skip.error: Failed to skip tutorial. Please try again.
skip.modal_message: You can resume the tutorial anytime from Account Settings

coming_soon.title: Coming Soon
coming_soon.message: Tutorial steps for this section will be added soon. Stay tuned!

navbar.title: Getting Started
navbar.description: Learn the basics of navigating Weavink and understanding the main interface.

links.title: Manage Your Links
links.description: Create and customize links to share on your digital business card.

appearance.title: Customize Appearance
appearance.description: Make your card unique with custom themes, colors, and layouts.

completion.title: Complete Tutorial
completion.description: Finish the tutorial and start using Weavink to its full potential.

account.title: Account & Privacy
account.description: Manage your personal data and privacy preferences across all privacy tabs.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Manage your contacts and networking connections
contacts.requires_upgrade: Your current subscription plan doesn't include contact management features.

search.title: Search Contacts
search.placeholder: Search contacts by name, email, company...
search.semantic_placeholder: Ask about your network: 'who knows React?' or 'marketing experts'
search.enhanced_description: AI analyzes your contacts semantically and provides intelligent insights about why each contact matches your query.
search.semantic_description: Semantic search finds contacts based on meaning, not just keywords. Upgrade to Business for AI-powered insights.
search.consent_required: AI Semantic Search requires your consent

review.title: Review & Refine Contact
review.subtitle: {{fields}} fields detected ‚Ä¢ {{categories}} categories
review.phone_tip: Tip: Include country code (e.g., +33 for France, +1 for US/Canada) for automatic flag detection
review.no_fields_detected: No other fields detected. Click 'Add Custom Field' to add more.
review.error_no_name: Please ensure the contact has a Name.

contacts.name: Name
contacts.deletion_warning_message: {{name}}'s account is scheduled for deletion on {{date}}. Their contact information will be anonymized after this date.

download_contact.profile_unavailable: This profile is not available for download
download_contact.title: Download Contact Information

contact_preview.title: Select Contact Information
contact_preview.subtitle: Choose which information to include in the vCard

business_card_scanner.login_required: Please log in to use the business card scanner
business_card_scanner.consent_required: Business Card Scanner requires your consent to use AI/OCR features
business_card_scanner.incorrect_image_count: Please select the correct number of images for your scan mode.

initial_screen.double_mode_description: Scan front and back for complete information
initial_screen.subtitle_single: Extract contact information automatically from business cards using AI
initial_screen.subtitle_double: Capture front and back for complete contact information

preview_screen.extracting_text: Extracting text and QR codes from your business card
preview_screen.pro_tip_double: Scanning both sides captures more complete contact information and social media links!
preview_screen.pro_tip_single: For best results, ensure the card is well-lit and text is clearly visible. Our AI can detect QR codes too!

shareCard.title: Share your Linktree
shareCard.subtitle: Get more visitors by sharing your Linktree everywhere.

addSocials.title: Add to your socials
addSocials.description: Add your Linktree URL to your social profiles for the world to easily find your Linktree.

shareTo.title: Share my Linktree to...
shareTo.description: Share your Linktree to all your connections so everyone knows about it.

qrCode.title: My Linktree QR code
qrCode.description: Here is your unique Linktree QR code that will direct people to your Linktree when scanned.

snapchat.description: Add your Linktree to your Snapchat Public Profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, open Snapchat, go to My Public Profile, tap Edit, then select Linktree or Website, then Add Your Linktree and paste your Linktree URL into the Add Linktree field.

instagram.description: Add your Linktree to your Instagram profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to Edit Profile, and paste it into the Website field.

facebook.description: Add your Linktree to your Facebook profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to the About page on your profile, click on Contact and basic info, then click on + Add a website, paste your Linktree URL into the Website address field, and click Save.

tiktok.description: Add your Linktree to your TikTok profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your TikTok profile, click on Manage Account, click on Edit profile, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field, then click Save. (Note you may need to switch to a TikTok business account to activate this).

twitch.description: Add your Linktree to your Twitch channel. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your Twitch channel, click About, then click Edit about & links settings, scroll down to Social Links, add Linktree in the first text field, and paste your Linktree URL into the second text field, then click Add.

facebookPage.description: Add your Linktree to your Facebook page. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to the About page, scroll to Additional Contact Info, click on Enter website, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field.

youtube.description: Add your Linktree to your YouTube channel. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to your YouTube channel, click on Customize Channel, then click on Basic info, and under Links, add a link title and paste your Linktree URL into the URL field, then click Publish.

linkedin.description: Add your Linktree to your LinkedIn profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your LinkedIn profile, click on pencil icon, scroll down to Contact info, paste your Linktree URL into the Website URL field, then click Apply.

pinterest.description: Add your Linktree to your Pinterest profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your Pinterest settings, paste your Linktree URL into the Website URL field, then click Save.

twitter.description: Add your Linktree to your Twitter profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to your profile, click on Edit Profile, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field.

account_deletion_confirmation.subject: Account Deletion Request Confirmed - Weavink
account_deletion_confirmation.headline: Account Deletion Scheduled
account_deletion_confirmation.intro: We have received your request to delete your Weavink account. Your account is scheduled for deletion on {{date}}.
account_deletion_confirmation.intro_immediate: We are processing your request to delete your Weavink account immediately.
account_deletion_confirmation.grace_period: You have a 30-day grace period to change your mind. You can cancel this request at any time before {{date}}.
account_deletion_confirmation.what_deleted: All your data will be permanently deleted, including:
account_deletion_confirmation.export_reminder: If you haven't already, we recommend exporting your data before the deletion date.
account_deletion_confirmation.cancel_instructions: To cancel this request, visit your account settings or contact our support team.

contact_deletion_notice.subject: Contact Update - {{deletedUserName}} Account Deletion
contact_deletion_notice.headline: Contact Deletion Notice
contact_deletion_notice.intro: {{deletedUserName}} has requested deletion of their Weavink account.
contact_deletion_notice.when_deleted: Their contact information will be anonymized on {{date}}.
contact_deletion_notice.your_notes: Your notes and interactions with this contact will remain available, but their personal information will be anonymized.
contact_deletion_notice.automated: This is an automated notice to keep you informed about changes to your contacts.

account_deletion_completed.subject: Your Weavink Account Has Been Deleted
account_deletion_completed.headline: Account Deletion Complete
account_deletion_completed.intro: Your Weavink account has been permanently deleted.
account_deletion_completed.all_data_deleted: All your personal data has been removed from our systems, including:
account_deletion_completed.billing_retained: Billing records have been archived for legal compliance (10 years as required by law).
account_deletion_completed.thank_you: Thank you for using Weavink. We're sorry to see you go.
account_deletion_completed.reregister: If you change your mind, you can always create a new account at any time.

account_deletion_cancelled.subject: Account Deletion Cancelled - Weavink
account_deletion_cancelled.headline: Deletion Request Cancelled
account_deletion_cancelled.intro: Your account deletion request has been successfully cancelled.
account_deletion_cancelled.account_safe: Your account is safe and remains fully active.
account_deletion_cancelled.no_data_lost: No data has been deleted. All your contacts, groups, and settings are intact.
account_deletion_cancelled.all_features: You can continue using all Weavink features without any interruption.

contact_deletion_cancelled.subject: Contact Deletion Cancelled - {{userName}}
contact_deletion_cancelled.headline: Contact Account Deletion Cancelled
contact_deletion_cancelled.intro: {{userName}}'s account deletion request has been cancelled.
contact_deletion_cancelled.account_active: Their Weavink account remains active and their contact information will not be anonymized.
contact_deletion_cancelled.no_action_needed: No action is required from you. This is for your information only.

data_export_completed.subject: Your Data Export is Ready - Weavink
data_export_completed.headline: Data Export Complete
data_export_completed.intro: Your data export has been completed successfully.
data_export_completed.gdpr_note: This export fulfills your GDPR Article 20 right to data portability.
data_export_completed.next_steps: Your export was included in the API response when you requested it. If you need another export, you can request one from your account settings.

export.rate_limit: Export rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

deletion.already_pending: You already have a pending deletion request
deletion.rate_limit: Too many deletion requests. Please wait before trying again.

permission.denied: You do not have permission for this action
